21 -class prepend_method_doc(object): 

22      """ 
23      Decorator to prepend documentation of a matching named method. 
24   
25      Usage:: 
26   
27          class A: 
28              def foo(): 
29                  \"\"\" Documentation of A.foo \"\"\" 
30   
31          class B: 
32              @prepend_method_doc(A) 
33              def foo(): 
34                  \"\"\" Documentation of B.foo \"\"\" 
35   
36      The documentation of B.foo will have the documentation of A.foo prepended. 
37   
38      """ 

39 -    def __init__(self, cls): 

40          self.cls = cls 

41   

42 -    def __call__(self, f): 

43          methodname = f.__name__ 
44          srcmethod = getattr(self.cls, methodname) 
45          srcdoc = getattr(srcmethod, '__doc__', '') 
46          f.__doc__ = srcdoc + f.__doc__ if f.__doc__ is not None else '' 
47          return f 

48
